wiki.content:
"Sand in My Shoes" peaked at #1 on the U.S. Billboard Hot Dance Club Play Chart in the Autumn of 2004.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "Sand in My Shoes" peaked at #1 on the U.S. Billboard Hot Dance Club Play Chart in the Autumn of 2004.

track.name: Sand in My Shoes
comments: It does sort of sound a bit like Lily Allen
This song always makes me want to go on holiday.  I love how grounded and down-to-earth the lyrics are. :-)
love it... brings some old memories...
I just got the CD of Life For Rent, and this song is a wonderful part of a wonderful album.
sounds like lily allen but i love this
One of my favs from Dido. :) Since childhood.
This disco version makes me wanna bust out my leisure suit.

Phew. That photo more beautiful. Listen to http://www.lastfm.es/music/SpittingSounds.
 I think I like it. See you soon
sarhoşum ve şarkıyı bağırarak söylüyorum. öptüm
